changes.change: Fixed preferences for Jailbreaks with symlinks
Removed unnecessary files
Fixed a potential memory leak caused by incorrect invalidation of timers
Added Velvet2 compatibility layer
Fixed the alignment of the title which can cause overlapping
Readded the offset slider which works fine since the autoresizing function
Removed assets which are no longer needed
Bugfixes and improvements
Fixed dependencies dont get installed with the tweak
This should fix that some people was never be able to use this tweak
Fixed notification size on iOS 15 devices
Fixed the realignment of some Labels by rewriting the mechanism for their color change
Improved performance
Removed unused code for the animations as they work fine
Fixed images from having the wrong insets on iOS 15
Added autoresizing of images, line-by-line
Removed the Offset Slider as the values are to high and cause visual glitches
Cleaning up some parts of the code
Fixed rootful support
Initial Release
